messages: I'm just really fucking sad right now & all I want to do is lay in bed & cry all day. This fucking sucks.

*Bruno Mars goes to do a split*
My mom: He's gonna break his walnuts! 😂
& when you smile the whole world stops and stares for awhile 🙊💕
